[甶]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – face/head of a ghost/spirit/demon, according to the Shuowen . However, it could be a mask.

[田]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – pictographic representation of a field divided into four sections. See the original version of 甫 and 里 . Sometimes it means mask. See 異 and 鬼 . Unrelated to 思 , 黄 , 果 , 由 , 甲 , and perhaps 番 .
